name: Datlo
headline: Datlo helps companies increase sales and expand through data
description: Datlo is a geointelligence platform made for sales and marketing folks. In seconds you can conduct market research, find new customers, and distribution channels for your company. All of that without needing a data scientist or a programmer.

Find out where
# Location Intelligence Platform forGo-to-Market and Expansion Teams 
Find new customers and strategic partners. Find new sites for expansion. Monitor the market and your competitors.
We work across various industries and countries, providing solutions that help industry leaders grow faster and more efficiently.
![Accurate](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/icon1.svg)
Accurate
We cross-check our data from various sources to provide you with the most accurate information on points of sale, consumer and household segmentation, and industry-specific insights.
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/icon2.svg)
Seamless
Our mapping platform is designed for all types of users, from business to technical. You can perform advanced analyses and gain quick insights without any friction.
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/shell.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/raizen.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/cargill.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/ifood.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/michelin.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/zf.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/energisa.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/sicoob.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/sicredi.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/unicesumar.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/yduqs.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/taschibra.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/unimed.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/neoenergia.png)
  * ![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/tereos.png)


## Empower your growth strategywith Location Intelligence
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/leads.svg)
### Find Local Businesses
Search among millions of companies to get B2B leads, find new partners, and monitor your competitors' territories.
[Request demo ](https://www.datlo.com/<#requestdemo>)
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/sites.svg)
### Choose Sites to Expand
Analyze the best spots to open a new store, branch, distribution center, franchise, or for placing OOH media.
[Request demo ](https://www.datlo.com/<#requestdemo>)
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/potential.svg)
### [Measure Your Potential](https://www.datlo.com/<#requestdemo>)
Know how many potential customers you have in a given region and understand their characteristics.
Request demo 
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/territory.svg)
### Manage Your Territory
Make the best use of your resources by planning your sales territory based on data and make it visible for your salespeople.
[Request demo ](https://www.datlo.com/<#requestdemo>)
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/img-project.png)
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/chart-en-us.png)
Go-To-Market
## Granular Data About Local Businesses
We use different sources to find and verify the existence of local stores. Most B2B lead providers have a hard time with data about small and local businesses. That's our specialty.
  * Company Name 
  * Geolocation 
  * Phone Number 
  * Neighborhood Segmentation 
  * Website 
  * Company Age and More 


### 60M+
Companies mapped
### 50k+
Cities covered
### 1500+
Categories
Consumer Segmentation
## Understand Consumer Characteristics
Explore data about people's age, income, housing, public services, and more. You can also measure how many potential buyers you have in the influence area of each store.
[Request demo](https://www.datlo.com/<#requestdemo>)
## Powerful Platform
Our cloud-based SaaS platform allows you to create visualizations and share them with hundreds of users. You can also upload your own data and cross-analyze it with the datasets already available.
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/bar_chart.svg)
### Business User
Get quick insights with an intuitive map interface. Save your maps and share them with your team.
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/code.svg)
### Technical User
Connect your datasets and make advanced location analysis work with as many layers as you need.
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/img.png)
Cloud Platform
## Build custom maps and increase the value of your data
You have powerful data in your hands, but to turn it into new business, you also need a powerful tool. Datlo provides an amazing Location Analysis platform, in addition to hundreds of ready-to-use datasets for you to cross-reference with your internal data and gain new insights.
  * Up-to-date datasets 
  * Beautiful layer styles 
  * Easy to upload new data 
  * Access permission levels 
  * Draw, calculate, save 
  * Dedicated Customer Success 


[Request Demo](https://www.datlo.com/<#requestdemo>)
Backed by[![](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/yc.png)](https://www.datlo.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)
We are present in various innovation ecosystems ![](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/evoa.png) ![](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/vitall.png) ![](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/amcham.png) ![](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/pulse.png) ![](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/liga.png)
## Datlo in the media
Our company has been featured in news articles multiple times, often in connection to events where our data has been used for journalistic purposes.
[![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/news1.png)](https://www.datlo.com/<https:/exame.com/exame-in/startup-datlo-y-combinator-maringa/>)
### [From Maringá to Silicon Valley: Datlo receives investment from Y Combinator  ](https://www.datlo.com/<https:/exame.com/exame-in/startup-datlo-y-combinator-maringa/>)
August 25, 2021 3 mins read
Founded in 2019, the company offers a data analysis service for the sales and marketing areas of large companies.
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/exame.png)
ExameBusiness Magazine
[Read article ](https://www.datlo.com/<https:/exame.com/exame-in/startup-datlo-y-combinator-maringa/>)

### [Brazilian Geolocation startup Datlo receives investment from Saudi fund ](https://www.datlo.com/<https:/anba.com.br/startup-de-geolocalizacao-datlo-tem-aporte-de-fundo-saudita/>)
August 19, 2022 3 mins read
Big data and AI techniques are used by Datlo to help large companies identify business opportunities based on location. The founder aims to expand the business globally.
![Datlo](https://www.datlo.com/assets/imgs/page/homepage5/author2.png)

generated_description:
**Datlo: Your Data-Driven Navigator in Sales and Marketing**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's S21 cohort, Datlo is a geointelligence platform based in Maringá, Brazil, with a focused mission: to help companies boost sales and expand their reach through insightful data. With a team of 31 passionate employees, Datlo is carving out its niche in the competitive landscape of SaaS, geographic information systems, and B2B solutions.

### What Does Datlo Do?

Imagine being able to conduct market research, locate potential customers, and identify new distribution channels in mere seconds—all without requiring a data scientist on speed dial. That's the magic of Datlo. Their platform allows sales and marketing teams to make data-driven decisions with ease. It offers a variety of functionalities such as:

- **Market Research**: Quickly gain insights into consumer behaviors and preferences.
- **Lead Generation**: Find local businesses to connect with, opening doors for B2B partnerships.
- **Site Evaluation**: Analyze optimal locations for expansion, whether you're opening a new store or a distribution center.
- **Territory Management**: Maintain a competitive edge by effectively planning and visualizing sales territories based on real data.

### The Power of Location Intelligence

What sets Datlo apart? It’s their robust location intelligence capabilities. They’ve mapped over 60 million companies in more than 50,000 cities across 1,500 categories. This extensive database allows users to analyze consumer characteristics and potential buyers in specific regions—vital for any successful growth strategy.

Built as a cloud-based SaaS platform, it caters to both business users looking for user-friendly insights and technical users needing advanced analytic capabilities. You can even integrate your datasets with Datlo's existing data to enhance your analysis.

### Backed by Expertise

Datlo isn't just a fly-by-night startup; their credibility is enhanced by backing from notable investment ecosystems, including Y Combinator. They've been featured in various media outlets for their innovative approach in leveraging geolocation data to empower businesses, from banking strategies to real-time COVID-19 monitoring.

### Conclusion

If you’re in sales or marketing and find yourself bogged down by data analysis hurdles, Datlo is here to simplify that complex landscape. Their platform not only delivers accurate data but also presents it in a seamless, intuitive format. Want to see for yourself? Request a demo and witness how Datlo can drive your business growth through intelligence and data. 

For more information, visit their [website](https://www.datlo.com/).
